title: Benefit cap statistics
description: Statistics on households that have had their benefits capped
datasetNotes: On the landing page scroll to latest releases and click on the most recent release link this will open another window scroll to documents and an ODS speadsheet is located at the bottom of this section.
sizingNotes: Large messy tables with foot notes
notes: Although not specifically Covid-19 the  spreadsheet may allow the impact of the pandemic to be derived.  the next release is due 06 August and will cover march - may
